credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Project for a ceiling painting
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli collection; purchased from Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Brush and chinese black wash, black chalk on paper
description: Octagonal.  A cupid sits upon clouds, raising with his right hand a burning heart.  At right are two heads of cupis.  Framed as a horzontal ovoid.  Squared.  On verso are accountings
name: Drawing
